plain: Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is science fiction/fantasy, their favourite plot is action/adventure, their favourite musical score is epic/orchestral, their favourite mood for the musical score is upbeat/energetic, their favourite setting is outer space or a fictional world, their favourite visual style is vibrant and imaginative, their favourite writing style is humorous and clever, their favourite runtime is around 2 hours, and their favourite themes are time travel, self-discovery, and comedy.
